When did I...regain my senses?
You must think me strange
for enjoying this pain. Ha ha.
dictionary.summon:
Seeing my friend during my last
moments made me realize that the path
I chose was much easier than his.

extra skill.desc: 状態異常の敵へのダメージを大幅にアップ＆被ダメージ時、確率でＢＢゲージを増加
extra skill.name: 友へと託す決意

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ＆攻撃力を８０％アップ
leader skill.name: 悪疫覚神の閃撃

10286.name: 覇刧明王神ヴィシュラ

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージ時、確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与・ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: 覇天・鬼神剣

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な炎属性２１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を超絶アップ・被ダメージ時、全状態異常をランダムに発生する効果を付与・ＢＢゲージを超絶増加
ubb.name: 鬼燼『焜葬烈覇』

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: リングライドアッシュ

dictionary.description: A soldier who led many civilians to El Gaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. Originally a member of the Agni Empire's knighthood, his valiant efforts during his battles against the god army were acknowledged by the general of the Agni army himself. However, after receiving a letter from his childhood friend Lucana, he left for home in a hurry. After learning about the upcoming great invasion of El Gaia from her, he planned to find refuge for the people of his hometown with the help of his friend Aneil.
dictionary.fusion:
Hmm, what an interesting technique.
It's like power is boiling within me.
Now I'm ready to fight!
dictionary.summon:
Having trouble?
Leave it to me!
I'll help you out, you'll see!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが６属性以上で全能力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 六極の威光

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: サンレイドグリッター

dictionary.description: A soldier who led many civilians to El Gaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. It is said that he continuously led the fights against the god army when fleeing with his people towards El Gaia. Because of his positive and indomitable spirit, many people gathered under him relying on his power, including both people from his hometown and many refugees from all other regions. And as if answering his prayers, the gods gifted him with more power to continue protecting the people.
dictionary.evolution:
This is my new power!
The voices that cry for my help
make me stronger!
dictionary.fusion:
I wanna get stronger!
There are too many people out there
who still need my help!
dictionary.summon:
Leave the fighting to me!
I'll put my blade on the line
to protect you!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが６属性以上で全能力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 六極神の威光

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: ヴァンクールストラーダ

dictionary.description: A soldier who led many civilians to Elgaia during the last stages of the war with the gods. After crossing Lucius's gate and finally reaching the new promised land, he decided to live his life to the fullest in the name of his fallen comrades. Traveling to every region he defeated demons and helped to mine for minerals, contributing greatly to the development of human civilization in Elgaia. Thanks to his great deeds many voiced their wish for him to be crowned as king, but he refused, stubbornly choosing to continue living as a mere adventurer.
dictionary.evolution:
I won't disappoint you!
Moving forward is
the only choice I have!
dictionary.fusion:
If you need me, let me know!
I'll come running any time
to save you from danger!
dictionary.summon:
Protecting your loved ones with all
your might isn't easy. There'll be
no more regrets this time!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが６属性以上で全能力を３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 六極神の覇光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１８連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＢゲージを増加
sbb.name: リベラシオン・サーガ

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性５連ダメージ
bb.name: 百鬼獄砕

dictionary.description: A member of a magical clan captured by the Agni Empire, Lyn manipulated a great fire strong enough to melt iron. Defeated by a high ranking priest, she had most of her powers sealed and was jailed. When the war with the gods began, she escaped. Unable to undo the seal, she vented her fury with what little magic she had, indiscriminately thrashing both humans and gods.
dictionary.fusion:
Oh! You want to give me power?
You're a strange one!
dictionary.summon:
You're a Summoner?
You need me even in my present state?
Let's wreak havoc together?

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の覇刃

dictionary.description: There's a story in Elgaia about a frog with a voracious appetite. It is said that this frog consumed the potential of people around it so that it could become king itself. However, after consuming so much potential it is said that other beings began targeting the frog in hopes of laying claim to its power. This voracious frog is now seen in Grand Gaia, though only very rarely. There is also a rumor that fusing with it could strengthen certain abilities...
dictionary.summon:
You're after my power too, human?
Ribbit, ribbit, ribbit!
Greedy as always, little human!

dictionary.description: An old legend passed down in Elgaia tells of a strong frog who shares a similar story to another creature there. According to the legend, when the gods used their powers to create the world, one being meant to keep their remaining power to himself. Trying to use such power for his own personal growth, rather than for the world's, the gods punished him by transforming him into a frog. Even as a frog, he still yearns for the power of creation, and thus is always targeted by others. When used as an ingredient for Fusion, it may lead to surprising beneficial effects.
dictionary.summon:
Croak?!
Someone's found me, ribbit!
What do you want with me, ribbit?

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性８連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: 火の鳥

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: パワーレイズ

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で弱体状態にする
bb.name: やきつくす

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: パワーレイズ

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性６連ダメージ
bb.name: アグレッサーロート

dictionary.description: The 12 Guardians of the Gods, made up of the most talented people from across every country. Farlon, one of the them, had absolute confidence in his abilities. As a young man he was usually very polite, but he was very competitive when it came to his comrades, and it's said he refused to open up to any of the other Guardians other than his sweetheart. It has also been told that he held strong ill will against the leader of the Guardians.
dictionary.fusion:
Give me more magic power.
I'll prove to you that I am
the strongest around.
dictionary.summon:
Swordsman of the 12 Guardians!
That is who I am!
Be sure not to forget it!

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 炎神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性８連ダメージ
bb.name: フォルタールージュ

dictionary.description: Wielding both blade and fire, he chased after the one who betrayed the Guardians. It's said that when a report came concerning the trator, Sodis, he was pleased by opportunity he'd been handed. He brushed off his sweetheart as she tried to stop him before heading off to vanquish Sodis, only to be defeated instead. It's even said that Sodis had to hold back so that he didn't accidentally kill him. His pride damaged and his anger out of control, Farlon then dedicated himself to defeating Sodis.
dictionary.evolution:
My flames grow stronger!
Still, I've yet a ways to go
before becoming the strongest!
dictionary.fusion:
I need more magic power!
Make me stronger!
I must redeem myself!
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner, I see.
I'll use anything at my disposal
to destroy him!

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 炎創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性９連ダメージ
bb.name: レッドイグニション

dictionary.description: Of of the 12 Guardians who wielded fire and his blade as he pursued the trators. Hearing that his girlfriend Ramna had betrayed the gods and left their land, filled with rage he chased after the trators, not even leaving time for his wounds to heal. He directed his angry flames toward his former allies who now sided with Sodis. It's said that even his girlfriend's heartfealt plea couldn't change his mind. In the end, no one knows upon whom or what his angry blade fell.
dictionary.evolution:
I will be the strongest!
Until then I must keep going forth.
My soul still burns strong!
dictionary.fusion:
Nngh, it's so hot!
This burning feeling inside of me
has ignited my soul!
dictionary.summon:
No one can quell my anger!
My flames will scorch everything!
It matters not who stands before me!

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットの攻撃力を６５％アップ
leader skill.name: 炎統神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の防御力を半減し、攻撃力を超絶アップ
sbb.name: クリムゾンウィング

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をアップ
bb.name: ルーベルインサニア

dictionary.description: Farlon was unable to hear the last words of the woman he loved and hurt so deeply. Having lost his way in the world, he stood there motionless as his sword went through the young lady that scorned him so. He then attacked the rest of his former comrades one by one, wielding more power than ever before. However, he showed no signs of hesitation or overconfidence, and instead displayed magnificent skill. After having defeated Rina and Sodis, Farlon eventually came to blows with Grybe. Legends say that the image of Farlon's beloved could be seen in his eyes just before the battle began.
dictionary.evolution:
The only thing these eyes see
are my enemies, both old and new.
That will never change...
dictionary.fusion:
Don't ask me for anything...
I... I...
dictionary.summon:
I'm not sad. I'm not in pain either.
I feel nothing.
I don't need...anything.

extra skill.desc: 被ダメージが一定数を超える度に１ターン、攻撃力を大幅にアップ
extra skill.name: 狂騒の咆哮

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットの攻撃力を１２０％アップ＆攻撃ＢＢの威力をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 炎烈狂神の力

10336.name: 赤鳳烈晃神ファルオン

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１６連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする＆３ターン、自分の防御力を半減し、攻撃力を超絶アップ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力をアップ
sbb.name: プロミネンスウィング

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な炎属性２１連ダメージ（残りＨＰが多いほど、威力をアップ）＆味方全体に２ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力を大幅にアップ
ubb.name: ソル・エクスハレイション

dictionary.description: This magical creature is said to systemize and store all Fire-related knowledge that Metal Units can hold within them. They may look gentle, but they are known for mercilessly criticizing anyone and everyone. Even the cynical Fire Ghosts get nervous and speechless around them. Though their harsh words may sound insulting at first, listen calmly and they insightful opinions on how to amend faults for the better. If you ever feel lost in life, you might want to seek one out.
dictionary.summon:
So you're a Summoner!
What's with that slack face!
Looks like I'll have to teach you!

10344.name: 炎のクリスタルゴッド

dictionary.description: An incarnation of the power of Fire from another world. Legend has it these beings are the key to unlocking powers greater than those of the gods. A being made from the agglomeration of what we know as fire, they were originally intended to provide otherworldly gods with even more power. However, records state that unable to control the Mecha Gods, the gods destroyed them all. According to folklore, once fire completely consumes a single entity in ruin, the soul of the entity sublimates onto a higher plane. If one is able to control the power of a Mecha God, the power of limitless Fire may become theirs.
dictionary.summon:
You summon the power of Fire...
Are you prepared to face
your own actions?

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力を少しアップ
bb.name: ダンシングソード

dictionary.description: One of the 12 Guardians of the Gods, protectors of the land of the gods. Girlfriend of Farlon, another of the 12 Guardians. Loved by all, it's said she always retained hope even when confronted with hardship, reassuring her allies with her smile. Her fire blade technique known as the "Fire Step" which she created using a unique rythmn was hard for even advanced warriors to evade. It's said that even the hard-headed, self-important Farlon couldn't refuse her requests.
dictionary.fusion:
My flames have grown stronger.
I bear my soul in this fiery dance.
This feels so very good!
dictionary.summon:
My fiery blade bear my passion!
I will use it to rip all to shreds!
Pretty powerful, don't you think?

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の護り

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ
bb.name: ロンドナール

dictionary.description: A former Guardian who attempted to put a hault to the gods' plan to destroy the humans. Worried about her lover she followed him as he set off to vanquish the traitor, but she instead came face to face with him in the wake of her lover's defeat. Upon asking why he'd rejected the gods, his reasoning made her decide to join him in his fight. She also determined that she would try to convince her lover as well, who would surely come to attack the traitor again once he was healed.
dictionary.evolution:
The more I look at you,
the less I'm able to resist.
Alright, let's give it our best!
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you!
I'll try even harder now!
Alright, let's go!
dictionary.summon:
The more we talk the more
I think I'm able to understand you.
That's why I believe in you.

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 樹の結界

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ
bb.name: クライムバリエート

dictionary.description: A former Guardian who attempted to stop the gods' plan to destroy the humans. Leaving the land of the gods as a traitor, her lover, now her enemy, appeared before her. Clashing swords with a man who now saw her as a traitor, she risked her life trying to persuade him to change. There is no record depicting how the volcanic clashing of these star-crossed lovers ended. However, a recently discovered diary suggests that they may have possibly made up in the end.
dictionary.evolution:
Do you believe in the
power of the love like I do?
Look how strong it's made me!
dictionary.fusion:
I like strong people,
but what is left for someone who's
surpassed everyone before them?
dictionary.summon:
I'll show you my secret fire dance!
No one can stop me now!
Alright then, here I go!

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆炎属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 樹神の断罪

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力をアップ・炎属性ユニットの攻撃力をアップ
sbb.name: 火葬円舞

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復＆３ターン、防御力・回復力をかなりアップ
bb.name: クライムグラドゥス

extra skill.desc: ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「味方全体の全状態異常を回復」を追加
extra skill.name: 浄化する優炎

leader skill.desc: 樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆炎属性の弱点属性ダメージを大幅にアップ＆全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 旋烈神の断罪

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体のＨＰを大回復＆３ターン、防御力・回復力をかなりアップ＆炎属性ユニットの攻撃力アップ
sbb.name: 麗紫 火葬連舞

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な炎属性２２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減・炎属性の弱点属性ダメージを超絶アップ
ubb.name: 絢爛竜舞『テルプシコーレ』

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に炎属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に雷属性を付与
bb.name: 秘呪・壱『パリカ』

dictionary.description: A mage residing in the outskirts of the Agni Empire, she learned the dark arts from her grandmother at a very young age. At the age of 14, she was blossoming into a powerful sorceress alongside her baby fire dragon Grazool, when her grandmother passed away. In her grandmother's storage closet was a vast library of both grimoires and romance novels. Her flashy way of dressing is either from the influence of her late grandmother or these books, but it has become commonplace for her nonetheless.
dictionary.fusion:
Is fusion supposed to tickle?
There's nothing in Grandma's books
about this!
dictionary.summon:
Watch where you're climbing,
Grazool! Oh, you just wanna meet
our new friend too, huh?

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光の力

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に強力な炎属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に雷属性を付与
bb.name: 秘呪・弐『ルガナ』

dictionary.description: A mage raised in the outskirts of the Agni Empire. One day, a letter of summons arrived from the Atharva Republic, claiming her late grandmother had leaked imperial secrets. Hoping to clear her grandmother's name, she headed to the capital along with her faithful dragon Grazool. There, she had the shocking realization that her grandmother had been a famous Atharvaian sorceress. Through fighting off the gods' attacks in this complex emotional state, she realized she was far superior to any normal human mage.
dictionary.evolution:
Think I'm pretty tough?
That means my grandma was
incredible!
dictionary.fusion:
It feels stuffy in here...
Either 'cause Grazool got bigger...
Or my outfit got tighter...
dictionary.summon:
I call the shots around here.
You didn't summon me...
I summoned you!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 五光神の力

bb.desc: ランダムで敵全体に強力な炎属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に雷属性を付与
bb.name: 秘呪・参『ポルトン』

dictionary.description: A mage raised in the outskirts of the Agni Empire. Her bravery in battle against the gods struck the fancy of Knight Agni, who invited her to join the Imperial Army. However, she refused, instead heading onward to her late grandmother's mansion in the Atharva Republic to find out more about her childhood hero. It was there she found her grandmother's hidden diary, containing the secrets of her birth. That was all it took for her and Grazool to charge straight at the gods at breakneck speed.
dictionary.evolution:
Hmm... I can feel all sorts of bits
and pieces of power flowing
through me...
dictionary.fusion:
We're both getting stronger.
But the sky's the limit,
so keep at it!
dictionary.summon:
Whoever's descendant I am,
I'll always be my grandma's girl!
And I'll always be myself!

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ＆ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
leader skill.name: 五光戦神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に雷属性を付与・ＢＣ出現率をアップ
sbb.name: 禁呪『メザクラノン』

bb.desc: 敵単体に炎属性６連ダメージ＆高確率で麻痺・弱体状態にする
bb.name: ソードアブレーション

dictionary.description: A fire god who tried to rebel against the higher ranking gods and paid for his transgression through a long period of incarceration. Although originally a lower ranking god, he drew the attention of the other gods thanks to his destructive ability on the battlefield. During the war with the humans, he was released in order to serve at the front lines. To him, fighting and destroying were his life, so he is said to have gladly taken the role he was given.
dictionary.fusion:
What...? I'm swelling up with power!
But this is not enough.
I need more!
Hand it over!
dictionary.summon:
To think I was summoned by a human.
Be as careful as you can when avoiding my whirling flames!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の煌めき

bb.desc: 敵単体に炎属性１０連ダメージ＆高確率で麻痺・弱体状態にする
bb.name: グラディスノール

dictionary.description: A fire god who tried to rebel against the higher ranking gods and paid for his transgression through a long period of incarceration. During the great war he continued to battle from the front lines, preferring to attack capital cities with gigantic fortresses and other similar places. Another account states that in order to satisfy his desire to destroy, he chose to fight in places that could take a lot of damage. Mercilessly burning everything that got in his path, he sent a shudder down the spine of every soldier.
dictionary.evolution:
I think I got some of my powers back...
With this, I can break more and more things!
dictionary.fusion:
This back and forth is all right with me.
The more power you give me, the more stuff I'll destroy.
That's what you want, right?
dictionary.summon:
You were the one to summon me here?
That's fine. I'll go as berserk as you expected me to.
So, where should the destruction begin?!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵単体に炎属性１５連ダメージ＆高確率で麻痺・弱体状態にする
bb.name: ファルメイドクロス

dictionary.description: A fire god who tried to rebel against the higher ranking gods and paid for his transgression through a long period of incarceration. After having destroyed numerous cities, he appeared in the Principality of Vriksha, where he confronted the owner of a Gatling gun from another world. Unfamiliar with the power of this weapon, Luther struggled with it at first. However, he proceeded to completely melt the bullets directed at him with the fire that enveloped him, rendering them useless. It is said that both the owner of the gun and the weapon itself were struck down in one fell swoop.
dictionary.evolution:
So you're going to release my true power...?
Now it's getting interesting!
I'll show you what ultimate destruction looks like!
dictionary.fusion:
Good... I feel like this power is burning up!
But don't give me bits and pieces of it, I want loads!
dictionary.summon:
You must have some guts to have summoned me.
This power that was intended to destroy the world
I will use to annihilate your enemies instead!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をアップ・スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の闘光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性２８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
sbb.name: 炎の大罪

dictionary.description: These creatures are said to have come about as workers around the time of creation. They share a hive mind, with no single specimen possessing much of an ego. That and the fact that they can dissolve into raw power means they can fuse quite well into other creatures, permanently boosting their Atk power. Do not leave them unattended for too long, as they are known to dissolve those around them when left to their own devices.
dictionary.summon:
We are one!
Me, myself, and I, and you...
Wait... what was I just saying?

bb.desc: 敵単体に炎属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: 王の盾

dictionary.description: A brave warrior from the Sama Kingdom who has accumulated many successes on the battlefield. He came to be famous not only for his enemy crushing swordsmanship, but also for the iron wall-like defense he used to protect his station. However, because he was not well educated and was often rude in nature, he came to be quite disliked by the masses. He himself didn't care about his humble upbringing, but meeting Exyl, who would later become his wife, would change his life greatly.
dictionary.fusion:
You have some guts
trying to make me feel inferior.
No, that way of talking is unacceptable!
dictionary.summon:
I don't wanna pledge myself
to some boring old guy.
Do you have what it
takes to surpass me?

leader skill.desc: 全ての状態異常にかなりかかりにくくなる
leader skill.name: 青浄の光風

bb.desc: 敵単体に炎属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: 神の盾

dictionary.description: A brave former general from the Sama Kingdom praised for his loyal heart and intelligence. After marrying Exyl he decided to cultivate his mind and learn, as he had been uneducated since his childhood. In only a couple of years, he was unrecognizable, having become an expert in various subjects and a civil official in order to work actively in government to keep the country's peace. After becoming a civil official, he figured that there would be constant threats against the king's life, so he always kept a sword close accompanied by a giant shield.
dictionary.evolution:
People can change.
I have, no, I am proof of that.
And so is the promise I made to my wife.
dictionary.fusion:
Fusion is just one way of growing.
I think it's important to grow
in any type of way.
dictionary.summon:
My shield is not for my protection.
But to protect those important to me
and the bonds we share.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効
leader skill.name: 蒼穹の神風

10464.name: 皇鋭神ダルバンシェル

bb.desc: 敵単体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: 神王の盾

dictionary.description: A loyal, intelligent, and highly praised civil official from the Sama Kingdom. Always sporting a giant shield, he was considered a coward by those around him. One day, the king's life was threatened by an assassin, but his life was spared when Darvanshel protected him with his shield. The king then changed his mind about his brave subject, and awarded him a new shield. Having named the shield after his beloved wife, it helped to protect the king from many other calamities, leaving Darvanshel to resort to his swordsmanship only in very rare cases.
dictionary.evolution:
My new shield bears my wife's name.
I will show you that it doesn't
shame me in battle.
dictionary.fusion:
It's difficult to learn with humility.
But I will not falter.
My wife taught me that.
dictionary.summon:
Worry not about others.
Walk the path you believe in.
I may be weak,
but I shall lend you my power.

leader skill.desc: 全状態異常を無効＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
leader skill.name: 永遠の聖域

10465.name: 盾皇神ダルバンシェル

sbb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減＆３ターン、防御力をアップ
sbb.name: シールドノヴァ

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: ロケットストライク

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 炎神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: ロケットバラージ

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 炎創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１６連ダメージ＆確率で麻痺状態にする
bb.name: ロケットストーム

leader skill.desc: 炎属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 炎創神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: 火幻術

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: インペリアルクロス

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: 竜幻術

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: インペリアルクロス

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性６連ダメージ＆確率で毒・病気状態にする
bb.name: 焔龍閃煌斬

dictionary.description: During the war with the gods, the Agni Empire had incredible power that was controlled by the emperor. He is said to have had great confidence in his own abilities, to make traitors pay by his own hand, and to have always ruled his people with a piercing aura of coercion. Because of this, many of his vassals suffered atrophies from hunching in fear, and would sometimes faint in his presence from nervousness. Also, before his crowning, he recruited many knights to serve under the Imperial Guard with under his leadership. It is said that to this day, they were the strongest and most elite knighthood in history.
dictionary.fusion:
I have no interest in you.
It would be wise
to remove yourself from my presence.
dictionary.summon:
Summoning others forth?
A skill only the powerless
would ever think of.

leader skill.desc: 通常攻撃時、確率でＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 皇帝の号令

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性７連ダメージ＆確率で毒・病気状態にする
bb.name: 真・焔龍閃煌斬

dictionary.description: During the war with the gods, the Agni Empire had incredible power that was controlled by the emperor. With the ambitious goal of making the Agni Region the strongest of them all, he trained elite swordsmen such as Fire Knight Lava, and carried out his own secret projects. At the time, he was often compared to his little brother, the general of the Agni army, whom he actually didn't care much for. He just took the popularity that came with it and used it to reign more efficiently.
dictionary.evolution:
Evolution? How useless.
As useless as that proud face of yours.
dictionary.fusion:
Continue fueling my power.
You have no other purpose
than to do as I command.
dictionary.summon:
Making you happy is easy.
Just do as I say.
There's no need to think.

leader skill.desc: 通常攻撃時、確率でＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 天帝の号令

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ＆確率で毒・病気状態にする
bb.name: 絶・焔龍閃煌斬

dictionary.description: During the war with the gods, the Agni Empire had incredible power that was controlled by the emperor. At the beginning of the great war he headed an ambush on the god army, but towards the end of the war he abandoned his people and tried to escape to another country, causing a confrontation between him and his younger brother, the general of the Agni army. He soon started to lose posterity, but recent studies show that the power he held later in the war was far more superior than any he had held before. Thus, since there is no contest about the fact that he fled to another country, there is a theory which states that he just didn't want to deal with his pesky subjects, but that he planned to come back after some time.
dictionary.evolution:
This is nothing special.
The strong grow stronger.
It is only natural.
dictionary.fusion:
To obey is also a talent.
Seems like your incompetence
might not be so useless after all.
dictionary.summon:
The Agni Empire
cannot be destroyed.
Simply because the empire
exists wherever I do.

leader skill.desc: 通常攻撃時、確率でＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆確率で防御貫通効果を付与
leader skill.name: 破壊神の号令

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ＆２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
sbb.name: 皇・焔龍閃煌覇斬

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰをかなり回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: ドラゴンヒール

dictionary.description: A witch who was raised as a candidate to become one of the 12 Guardians of the Gods in the next era. It is said that the pure Ulkina began her divine studies when she was taken in by some priests, and subsequently initiated in obscure magical techniques. Everyone was sure that she would become part of the 12 Guardians of the Gods, but with Sodis's insurrection, the order collapsed. Still yearning to become one of the 12 Guardians of the Gods, their downfall inspired her to take her magical studies even more seriously.
dictionary.fusion:
Receiving power not from the gods.
I don't want to allow it,
but it seems I have no choice...
dictionary.summon:
You need my magic?
This is power I've refined for the gods.
I don't want to use it here.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 王者の魔力

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: ドラゴンリリーヴ

dictionary.description: A religious fanatic witch who was raised in a shrine. After the fall of the 12 Guardians of the Gods, she immersed herself in her magical studies while yearning to join their ranks. In turn, her heart grew darker. She decided to pledge herself to the will of the gods themselves instead of to the Guardians, and there are reports left behind which state that she judged blasphemous people with her fire. In many of these stories it is written that she claimed "those who doubt the gods are not fit to live," and took it upon herself to pass this type of judgment from village to village.
dictionary.evolution:
I know full well that the only true
power comes from the gods.
dictionary.fusion:
What do you have to gain
by endowing me with power?
Is this also the will of the gods?
dictionary.summon:
All right.
I shall help you build
your piety.

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減
leader skill.name: 覇王の魔力

bb.desc: 味方全体のＨＰを大回復・全状態異常を回復
bb.name: ドラゴンズティア

dictionary.description: A witch who joined the God Army whilst remaining a human. Once the gods had decided to destroy the human race, she vowed to do the same without hesitation, gaining the opportunity to learn new secret fire techniques from the gods themselves. Her resolution never swayed, even when she understood that as a human she too would be judged in the end. Treasuring her bonds with humans more than her faith towards the gods, Selena, one of the Six Heroes, is said to have become Ulkina's main target towards the end of the great war.
dictionary.evolution:
This fire comes from the gods.
Everything impure shall be cleansed
by my flames.
dictionary.fusion:
Not only can I feel your power,
I can also feel the gods' power!
I shall be sublimated!
dictionary.summon:
You defy the gods.
Have you really thought about
what that truly means?

leader skill.desc: ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減＆全てのユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ
leader skill.name: 天神の魔力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１７連ダメージ＆味方全体の全状態異常を回復＆３ターン、全状態異常を無効
sbb.name: 竜の庭園

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１３連ダメージ＆確率で怪我・弱体状態にする＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: 緋の太刀『創焔』

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Owen, one of the Summoners of Old from the Akras Summoners' Hall. Owen, also known as "The First Summoner," explored the whole of Grand Gaia with his fellow Elder Summoner, Grahdens. He opened the way for the exploration of many regions, and was a great influence in the establishment of Summoners' Hall. And although the real Owen still holds incomparable ability on the battlefield, this mock Unit unfortunately cannot fully replicate the full extent of his power.
dictionary.fusion:
You still have much to learn...
You must try to command me properly.
dictionary.summon:
You, I like your eyes.
But will you be able to make
proper use of "The First Summoner"?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの全能力を２０％アップ＆クリティカル時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加・ダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 暁神の威厳

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１８連ダメージ＆確率で怪我・弱体状態にする＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率をアップ
bb.name: 暁の絶刀『創煌焔』

dictionary.description: A mock Unit modeled after Owen, one of the Summoners of Old from the Akras Summoners' Hall. As the leader of Summoners' Hall, he keeps a sharp eye over the Randall Empire and Elgaia as a whole. Known to be as strict with himself as he is with others, Grahdens is rumored to have claimed that Owen to has "enough sense of responsibility and duty for the both of us." Also, having been the first to sense the growing threat emanating from Ishgria, he began training himself and his subordinates against the incoming demon menace.
dictionary.evolution:
Well, you made me evolve.
However, the greatness I seek is still afar.
This will not suffice...
dictionary.fusion:
There is no end to the search for
power! I shall train anew!
The demons will not sit idly by!!
dictionary.summon:
"Ishgria," the land of the demons.
I need you all to grow stronger
for the battle that lies ahead.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの全能力を３５％アップ＆クリティカル時、ＢＢゲージを大幅に増加・ダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 暁神の覇厳

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性２５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、防御力に応じて攻撃力を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: アルス・マグナ

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１９連ダメージ＆高確率で怪我・弱体状態にする＆味方全体に３ターン、クリティカル率を超絶アップ
bb.name: 燼の秘刀『羅神焔』

extra skill.desc: 「羅獄焔燼メドブレア」を装備時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２０％アップ＆ＢＢ及びＳＢＢに「３ターン、状態異常の敵へのダメージを大幅にアップ」を追加
extra skill.name: 百錬万丈

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの全能力を５０％アップ＆クリティカル時、ＢＢゲージを大幅に増加・ダメージを超絶にアップ
leader skill.name: 暁絶神の覇厳

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性２６連ダメージ（連続発動で威力をアップ）＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力をかなりアップ・防御力に応じて攻撃力を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: メドブレアの覇焔

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な炎属性２９連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に超強力な追加ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力・防御力・回復力を超絶アップ・攻撃ＢＢの威力を超絶アップ・クリティカルダメージを超絶アップ
ubb.name: ウェルム・アルス・マグナ

dictionary.description: The all-purpose store "Lawson" is rumored to have come from a loophole in the gate that leads to another world. Spreading all over Grand Gaia, it distributed information stating that it was in need of employees. It was then when the greedy and famous Burst Frog nominated itself for the job. With its red body covered by a blue and white striped uniform, it greets costumers with a smile and eye contact, bringing many Summoners to the store. However, since it spends most of the money it makes buying things from the same store, it never seems to have much left over.
dictionary.summon:
Ribbit, ribbit!
They sell everything
in this store!

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: 旋風斬り

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをアップ＆スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 聖剣の勇者

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ・クリティカル率をかなりアップ・スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: 魚雷旋風斬り

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをアップ＆スパークダメージを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 聖剣の勇者

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎・雷属性を付与
bb.name: 嘆きの炎

dictionary.description: A swordswoman that was punished for opposing the gods long before the great war. Imprisoned in a temple, she was cursed by the gods to age physically, but never die. This punishment was supposed to make her taste desolation throughout eternity. However, a certain god remembered the prowess she had demonstrated when defying the gods and released her on parole. She was then made to vanquish evil demons in order to repent for her sins.
dictionary.fusion:
What do you want from this ugly, old
lady? I may not do what you ask,
but I will hear you out.
dictionary.summon:
Summoner, or whatever.
Do you plan on using this old woman?
You are no different than the gods.

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の波紋

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎・雷属性を付与
bb.name: 絶望の炎

dictionary.description: A swordswoman made to repent through manual labor for retaliating against the gods. Reports left behind state that though her muscles had aged considerably, she could still slay evil demons with her expert swordsmanship. There are many written accounts of her defeating numerous demons, but after she headed to the island of the giants, such accounts end abruptly. Other folklore states that she successfully sealed the demons in the island, but the latter part of her life is still under investigation.
dictionary.evolution:
Has the punishment of the gods waned?
Maybe not.
I'll serve you a bit longer.
dictionary.fusion:
You, irritating punishment of the
gods... Don't you want to free me,
and witness my true form?
dictionary.summon:
As you can see, I'm an ugly old lady.
Though I do have a lot of confidence
in my swordsmanship.

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の蔓延

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎・雷属性を付与
bb.name: 神滅の炎

dictionary.description: A swordswoman made to repent through manual labor for retaliating against the gods. While in the island of the giants, she came across a demonic creature that consumed other demons for sustenance. However, she also noticed that this creature was able to consume magical power and curses as well. Though she hesitated momentarily, she mustered up courage and threw herself into the mucus-like body of the creature. The curse she had been given by the gods was then consumed by the demon, and she returned to her original form. The rejuvenated swordswoman sealed the unexpectedly useful monster without killing it, and began a journey rejoicing in her newfound freedom.
dictionary.evolution:
Ohhh! This liberating feeling!
Not only has my body been freed,
but my soul too!
dictionary.fusion:
Hahahaha!
I'm overflowing with strength!
With this power, the servant shall become the master!
dictionary.summon:
You're no different from the gods.
Anyone who tries to chain me
shall become my enemy.

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生＆確率でＨＰを少し吸収
leader skill.name: 悪疫神の奪魂

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１６連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン大幅に低下＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎・雷属性を付与
sbb.name: スカーレット・キス

bb.desc: 敵単体に炎属性７連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: スラッシュバーン

dictionary.description: A knight from a small country around the Bariura region. Holding incredible power from infancy, he accidentally hurt his younger sister when his powers went out of control in a sudden discharge. He then sealed his own powers and subsequently left on a journey away from home. However, one day an ancient dragon that had suddenly been resurrected destroyed his hometown, causing the loss of his beloved sister's life in the process. Arus released his power from the seal and set off to hunt the dragon. He would later meet Priscilla, the queen of a ruined country, whom he is said to have disliked at the beginning of their relationship.
dictionary.fusion:
Are you trying to release my power?
Quit while you're ahead.
You have no right over me.
dictionary.summon:
You have bad luck too, huh?
Summoning me, who fears battle.
But don't feel down. I'll help you.

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の刃

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な炎属性９連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: スラッシュバースト

dictionary.description: A knight accompanied by the queen of a ruined country who seeks vengeance against an ancient dragon. Having finally found the dragon, the queen tried reasoning with it, managing to get a favorable response. However, seeing this as the perfect opportunity to strike, Arus attacked the dragon with all his might. He was successful in dealing a serious blow against the creature, but its powerful counter attack left both him and the queen in great peril. Regretting what he had done, Arus decided to throw away his life to help the queen escape when a mysterious sentry suddenly came to their rescue.
dictionary.evolution:
My power grows with my anger!
I will release the flame of vengeance!
No one can stop me now!
dictionary.fusion:
I can take in more power!
Even if it drives me insane,
it's still better than losing!
dictionary.summon:
My sister was my only relative.
Did you summon a loner like me
in hopes of building a family?

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の鋭刃

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な炎属性１１連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加
bb.name: スラッシュフレア

dictionary.description: A knight seeking to defeat an ancient dragon. After defeating the ancient dragon, his mentality changed drastically. While chatting with the sentry that had rescued him and the queen, and the new disciples that had joined him in his quest for a rematch with the dragon, he realized that it was not vengeance which had awakened within him, but rather, something else. When he challenged the dragon once more, he unleashed every bit of his previously sealed power, attaining victory. It is said that he disappeared into a gate afterwards, but that he did so while taking Priscilla by the hand.
dictionary.evolution:
I don't fear my power anymore.
That's because I never want to lose
anyone precious to me again.
dictionary.fusion:
I don't care about my power's origin.
The only thing I want
is to grow stronger.
dictionary.summon:
You don't know what you have,
till it's gone. Those who helped me
must've been as foolish as me.

leader skill.desc: 確率で防御貫通効果を付与＆クリティカルダメージをかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 破壊神の閃撃

sbb.desc: 敵単体に強力な炎属性１６連ダメージ＆自分のＢＢゲージを満タンにする
sbb.name: フェニックスグライド

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、炎・光属性ユニットの攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: フリルナル

leader skill.desc: 炎・光属性ユニットの攻撃力を２５％アップ＆闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１０％軽減
leader skill.name: 灰の賢杖

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、炎・光属性ユニットの攻撃力を少しアップ
bb.name: ルインリム

leader skill.desc: 炎・光属性ユニットの攻撃力を５０％アップ＆闇属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 灰の輝杖

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ
bb.name: 鳳凰天駆

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど、攻撃力をかなりアップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 太陽の勇気を継ぐ者

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１３連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎属性を付与
bb.name: 皇王天翔翼

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど、攻撃力をかなりアップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 太陽の勇気を継ぐ者

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎属性を付与
bb.name: 鳳凰天駆・極

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど、攻撃力を大幅にアップ＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
leader skill.name: 強き絆で結ばれた者

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１５連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎属性を付与
sbb.name: 皇王天翔翼・極

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性６連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: ブレイジングスマッシュ

dictionary.description: A magic wielding soldier from the Agni Empire. His father was a well-renowned metalworker in the empire, which meant he had been exposed to such knowledge from an early age. However, his innate quick temper led him to pursue the path of a mercenary. He distinguished himself on the battlefield as a magic wielding soldier, but some find it questionable that he could have learned such high level martial arts and smithing techniques all by himself. Thus, many historians today still search for proof that he once had a master.
dictionary.fusion:
Hey! You! Listen!
Don't go putting your filthy hands
on my precious armor, all right?!
dictionary.summon:
The name's Vanberk!
You impressed?
Consider our meeting an honor!

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の刃

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: インフェルノフォール

dictionary.description: A blacksmith specializing in helmets and a famed magic wielding soldier. When placed on the battlefield as a mercenary, he insisted on having the most extravagant armor, eventually beginning to make it himself. The beauty of the delicate adornments on his helmet gained him fame as a blacksmith, procuring customers from noble families, such as knights, and even the emperor himself. However, at this point in time he wished to be recognized only for his skills as a soldier, and it is rumored that he refused the emperor's request for his services for this very reason.
dictionary.evolution:
The most suitable armor for you
should be made by your own self!
That's my motto!
dictionary.fusion:
Interested in my armor, I see.
Well then, I'll show it to ya.
But don't you dare touch it!
dictionary.summon:
I'm Vanberk, the strongest soldier!
I'm but a simple blacksmith, you say?
You wanna fight?!

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 閃撃の覇刃

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
bb.name: マグニードメテオ

dictionary.description: The most renowned and praised helmet smith in Agni history. When the war with the gods began, his soldier side and his blacksmith side finally started unifying. Along with the experience he had gained on the battlefield, he put his fire magic to use in order to leave behind countless masterpieces as his legacy. However, the pieces he was most proud of he would always keep for himself. It is said that when Vanberk was clad in his best armor, he was impossible to take down in the battlefield.
dictionary.evolution:
Though I may be a soldier,
I'm also an excellent blacksmith!
You better remember that!
dictionary.fusion:
What do you think of my armor?
She's a beauty, ain't she?
Hey, I said hands off!
dictionary.summon:
As a top soldier, I make top armor.
I can infuse magic to it too.
I'm the best, am I right?!

leader skill.desc: クリティカルダメージを大幅にアップ＆確率で被ダメージの２０％を相手に反射する
leader skill.name: 閃撃の謀略

10585.name: 堅武炎神ヴァンベルク

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与＆３ターン、クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
sbb.name: アポロニアディザスター

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な炎属性８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: エルガーグラッジ

dictionary.description: A disciple who once served Zevalhua the Supreme. He was known for his firm believe in power. It is believed he thought very little of Mare, another of Zevalhua's disciples. Claiming that weakness was evil, many stories left behind accuse him of causing problems on account of his beliefs. However, Zevalhua enjoyed his particular attitude, and never punished him for his actions. Any further information on this disciple became unavailable long before the great war against the gods.
dictionary.fusion:
Becoming stronger brings me joy.
I don't care for anything else.
dictionary.summon:
You're stronger than me?
It sure doesn't seem so.
Well, I'll lend you my power for now.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を２０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の力

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な炎属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰをかなり回復
bb.name: カルドスプレッド

dictionary.description: A former disciple of Zevalhua the Supreme. Claiming power to be everything, it is said that Alpha challenged his mistress Zevalhua to test her power. This was the first time he came to understand the delight of giving one's all on the battlefield.  However, the battle was interrupted thanks to one of Mare's tricks, forcing Alpha to retire after suffering a serious wound. Following the battle he received aid from a higher ranking god who offered him a barrier to slumber in while his wounds healed.
dictionary.evolution:
It seems I've grown.
I suppose it means that now I can face
even stronger opponents than before.
dictionary.fusion:
Do you grasp the importance of power?
Hmph. Not even when it's so clearly
depicted before you?
dictionary.summon:
A Summoner who relies on people.
And I, who pledged myself to you.
Hmph, I wonder who's stronger.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を４０％アップ＆確率でＨＰを少し吸収
leader skill.name: 狩統神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１２連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の最大ＨＰに応じて攻撃力をアップ
sbb.name: ラーヴァグレイブ

bb.desc: 敵単体に強力な炎属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＨＰを大回復
bb.name: カルドヘルツォーク

dictionary.description: A former disciple of Zevalhua who was sealed in Ishgria. Though Alpha had been offered a barrier in which to slumber in order to heal his wounds, this was actually a trap to seal him away. However, he was told by his captor that the disciples known as the Six Pillars were to battle each other, rewarding the victor with more power. And thus, Alpha entered the competition in high spirits, releasing the true extent of his power as he fought. Although unbeknownst to him, apparently this was all a ploy to lead the disciples to destroy one another.
dictionary.evolution:
My goal is another fight with Lady Zevalhua.
I will grow stronger again
in order to face her!
dictionary.fusion:
It's not enough!
I need even more power
to attain the strength I seek!
dictionary.summon:
I don't care if it is a trap.
The only thing that matters,
is whether it makes me stronger or not.

extra skill.desc: ＨＰが満タン時、攻撃力をかなりアップ
extra skill.name: 勇猛なる戦士の力

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を８０％アップ＆ＨＰを少し吸収
leader skill.name: 狩統神の轟力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１８連ダメージ＆３ターン、自分の最大ＨＰに応じて攻撃力をアップ
sbb.name: ラーヴァカイザー

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な炎属性ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、最大ＨＰに応じて攻撃力を大幅にアップ
ubb.name: ヘリオヴィクティム

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをアップ
bb.name: フラム・シャルール

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith, who worshipped the Holy Emperor Karna Masta in the La Veda Republic. Born the daughter of a priest from the Great Holy Shrine, she later became a knight until her and her younger twin brother were ordered to serve as Guardians. Surpassing every quality expected of a warrior, including heart, technique, and physique, she was admired by many. However, there are those who claim she turned into a completely different person on the battlefield, turning into an almost demonic creature when infuriated, and sprouting the rumor that something violent lived within her. On the other hand, she is said to have been overprotective of her younger brother as well.
dictionary.fusion:
Even though you're human,
you dare venture into divine territory?
How insolent.
dictionary.summon:
My power is that of the gods.
You mean to use that power?
Prepare yourself, and call me forth.

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ
leader skill.name: 重激の閃光

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
bb.name: フラム・ヴィルトルフ

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith. When Grand Gaia found itself threatened by demon attacks, the Holy Emperor bestowed a pike of flame upon her, subsequently joining forces with other Guardians to visit territories that had been sealed away. It is said that it was there where she performed a feat that surpassed the gods' expectations. Legend has it that a group of gods thought her rapidly growing power a menace, as it almost surpassed those of regular disciples, and thus sent her off on a demon slaying mission they predicted she would not return from.
dictionary.evolution:
Fighting strong opponents has made
me more powerful! Now, bring
an even stronger one before me!
dictionary.fusion:
Once accustomed, this is bearable.
I apologize for my initial
animosity towards you.
dictionary.summon:
Not to worry.
I shall fight by your side.
All demons will perish by my pike!

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを５０％アップ＆全てのユニットの攻撃力・防御力を１０％アップ
leader skill.name: 閃統神の栄誉

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性２４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ・ＢＣ出現率をアップ
sbb.name: 炎纏『デゾンフローガ』

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ
bb.name: フラム・アラドヴァル

dictionary.description: One of the sacred Guardians of Meirith. While out on a mission, she received word of some heretics who planned to defy Karna Masta, and decided to return immediately. This choice would mean leaving her friend Quaid behind in the territory they had been exploring, but according to legend, Claire chose to go with her brother in the end. Once she had returned to the Holy Emperor's side, she faced off against a group of bladed warriors, ultimately falling in battle as she tried to protect her brother. Too weakened by the wounds she had received during her previous mission to recover, she left her last words to her beloved brother.
dictionary.evolution:
The will to protect is
the precious emotion that
acts as the source of my power.
dictionary.fusion:
Your ignorance resembles that of my
younger brother and that worries me.
I can't just let it be...
dictionary.summon:
Why do I always attract the helpless?
It would seem I can't escape
my role as a big sister. Hehe.

extra skill.desc: 「焔煉神槍ネグオーネ」を装備時、または、パーティ内に「クルト」がいると戦闘中に攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
extra skill.name: 蒼剣の絆

leader skill.desc: スパークダメージを７５％アップ＆全てのユニットの攻撃力・防御力を３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 閃統神の栄冠

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性３０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを大幅にアップ・ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
sbb.name: 紅蓮穿『デゾンブレイズ』

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な炎属性４０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージを超絶アップ・攻撃力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: ソールエクスファニス

bb.desc: 敵単体に炎属性６連ダメージ＆確率で毒・病気状態にする
bb.name: フレイムペイン

dictionary.description: A plant in Ishgria decorated with a strange pattern. The vivid colors of the Brangea lure creatures towards it, devouring them with its sharp teeth in a matter of seconds. Its only natural instinct is to feed itself to survive, so it often moves around in order to find nourishment to consume. Not only does it consume living creatures, but also any nutritious minerals that it happens to find to replenish its energy.
dictionary.fusion:
You've given me nourishment.
However, it's not enough.
I need lots more...
dictionary.summon:
Who are you?
Well, if you bring me food,
it doesn't really matter.

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の波紋

bb.desc: 敵単体に炎属性９連ダメージ＆確率で毒・病気状態にする
bb.name: ヴェノブルーム

dictionary.description: A plant in Ishgria decorated with a strange pattern. It consumes other living organisms in order to restore its energy, but consuming more than the necessary amount makes it go into a frenzy, rendering it unable to control itself. Extremely aggressive in nature, it considers any living thing in its surroundings to be an enemy, and rushes to attack it. The creatures which fall prey to the Granmeria are chopped to bits by its poisonous fangs, and are said to be eaten until no trace of them remains.
dictionary.evolution:
GRAAAAAAAH...
I can feel my body evolving.
You should find me more sustenance.
dictionary.fusion:
Is that all you have for me?
Hurry up and bring me more.
I want to feel nourished.
dictionary.summon:
So you're a Summoner?
Don't bore me if I go with you,
otherwise I'll go berserk.

leader skill.desc: 確率で全状態異常をランダムに発生
leader skill.name: 悪疫の波紋

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性５連ダメージ＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを軽減
bb.name: 重装華

dictionary.description: A female knight from the La Veda Republic who lived before the great war against the gods took place. Extremely talented in the art of battle and a natural warrior, Anje is said to have been expected to become a great knight. Many believe that though she was the silent type, she was kind and loving to animals, and a very fervent worshipper of the gods. Anje was last seen offering a morning prayer to the gods before she vanished without a trace. Countless knights of the kingdom were sent out in search of her, but she was never found.
dictionary.fusion:
Thank you...
I'm glad to know...
That I'm of some use...
dictionary.summon:
I've been summoned...?
Nice to meet you...
I shall be your lance and shield...

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど、防御力をアップ
leader skill.name: 紅盾の陣

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性７連ダメージ＆味方全体に１ターン、被ダメージを軽減
bb.name: 重装鉄華

dictionary.description: A female knight from the La Veda Republic. After her disappearance from Grand Gaia, she was spotted once again in the land of Ishgria battling some lesser demons.  Although how she ended up in Ishgria is still a mystery, Anje believed that the gods had led her to Ishgria on a mission against the native demons. However, after meeting a certain magician there who revealed the truth to her, she stopped believing in what she thought had been her divine mission.
dictionary.evolution:
Power has made me stronger...
Now I can truly fight...
And protect you, as well...
dictionary.fusion:
This means I should grow stronger...
All right, I understand...
I guess it's not so bad
to be depended on...
dictionary.summon:
Was I...summoned here...?
I'm so happy to be needed...
As a knight, I vow to help you...

leader skill.desc: 残りＨＰが多いほど、防御力をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 紅鋼の護陣

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我・弱体を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: へヴィフェルド

dictionary.description: An ancient dragon with live fire within itself. A being from ancient times with destructive powers rivaling those of demons. Legend claims that its movements on land alone shaped continents. Its cries were also said to cause mountains to erupt like fountains of hot magma. These legends were believed to have originated from the fear of natural disasters, but since the recent confirmation of the existence of ancient dragons, many claim that some truth can be found in myth after all.
dictionary.fusion:
You dare force upon me
your pathetic human knowledge...?
So be it...
dictionary.summon:
Seeker of destruction...
You have released me...
Now everything shall burn to ashes...

leader skill.desc: 炎・樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減
leader skill.name: 炎樹の結界

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我・弱体を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: アトミックフェルド

dictionary.description: An ancient dragon which once rampaged about Ishgria. It used all of its power to continue its reckless destruction, until one day something began to calm it down. This led the dragon to a fight with a demon in which it realized that it should control its own power. According to records left behind, Volarda faced its worthy rival time and again, each of them growing stronger with every battle, and gifting Volarda with enough reasoning to learn to enjoy the fighting in the process.
dictionary.evolution:
Power will not suffice to move forth.
Force of will is most important...
dictionary.fusion:
My soul runs wild with fire...
This must be your doing...
dictionary.summon:
Child...
Do not presume to control me...
I only seek my sworn friend...

leader skill.desc: 炎・樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
leader skill.name: 護炎樹の崩激

10635.name: 赫炎竜神ヴォルラーダ

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１４連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に追加ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我・弱体を発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: メレグ・ヴァルカン

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我・弱体を発生する効果を付与
bb.name: タイラントフェルド

dictionary.description: An ancient dragon feared by even demons themselves. Literature states that this dragon's continuous battles against its favorite opponent were not with the intent of destroying said opponent, but were part of a relationship based on friendly rivalry. It is said that when Magnazorda's friend fell into great peril whilst in battle, the great dragon flew to his side, both guarding each other's backs on the battlefield. However, the number of enemies grew before victory could be determined, and Magnazorda was slain in Ishgria by some being who had appeared from behind.
dictionary.evolution:
Can you feel the heat of this great
flame? This is the ancient power
you have resurrected!
dictionary.fusion:
The flames dance...
Can you see it, child of fire?
My spirit burns with them...
dictionary.summon:
To think your spirit would be
similar to that of my friend...
Hmph, how amusing...

extra skill.desc: 確率で被ダメージの１５％を相手に反射する
extra skill.name: 永遠なる獄焔

leader skill.desc: 炎・樹属性ユニットからの被ダメージを１５％軽減＆確率で怪我・弱体状態にする
leader skill.name: 護炎樹の重崩激

10636.name: 獄焔神竜マグナゾルダ

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１７連ダメージ＆３ターン、ターン終了時に強力な追加ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを大幅に増加＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で怪我・弱体を発生する効果を付与
sbb.name: メレグ・ドレイク

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な炎属性２０連ダメージ＆１ターン、ターン終了時に超強力な追加ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを超絶増加
ubb.name: ヴェイパライズ・ノヴァ

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１５連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下する効果を付与
bb.name: フリットカロル

dictionary.description: A fox-girl and skilled sword fighter who once fought alongside the Oracle Knight against the gods who sought to destroy humankind. Belonging to a tribe of fox-people in the area surrounding the Agni Region, Ruby was bitten by curiosity while still young, setting off on a journey in which she saved numerous humans from the clutches of demons. Dancing in battle with the treasured weapon of her village, which had been handed down from generation to generation, she is said to have charmed the hearts of many.
dictionary.fusion:
I can feel power surging through me!
Yeah, this isn't too bad!
Not bad at all!!
dictionary.summon:
Huh? Where am I?!
Well, I guess as long as it looks fun
it doesn't matter where I end up!

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの煌めき

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１８連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下する効果を付与
bb.name: フリットリプカ

dictionary.description: A fox-girl and skilled sword fighter who once fought alongside the Oracle Knight. Surrounded by humans who sought to hunt the ever rare fox-people, Ruby was saved by the Oracle Knight from this peril. Smitten by the knight who had saved her, Ruby decided to follow him, accompanying and aiding him in his journey. It was after meeting the Oracle Maiden dear to the Oracle Knight's heart that Ruby officially joined their cause. However, she never got along with her comrade Dion, resulting in a relationship made of endless bickering.
dictionary.evolution:
My looks have changed a bit!
I wonder if now
he'll take a second look at me...
dictionary.fusion:
Nice! This is good!
I really like all the joyful energy
I'm receiving here!
dictionary.summon:
Me meeting him was fated!
What about our meeting?
Was it fated too?

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ
leader skill.name: 闘いの閃光

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性３０連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下する効果を付与
sbb.name: ルビィ・エンブレイズ

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性２０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下する効果を付与
bb.name: フリットアングリフ

dictionary.description: A skilled sword fighter who once fought alongside the Oracle Knight. With new and improved arms to match her ever growing swordsmanship, Ruby enveloped her enemies in flames, cutting the gods down alongside her companions.  Having very sharp senses due to her nature as a fox-person, she could sense every one of the gods' moves before anyone else. As the battle drew on, she used her body to shield the Oracle Knight, suffering a serious wound in the process. The outcome of this battle remains uncertain, and no records concerning Ruby have been found after this time.
dictionary.evolution:
I've changed even more this time!
Now any opponent I face
stands no chance of winning!
dictionary.fusion:
Can't you give me a bit more power?
You see, there's lots of people
I wanna protect!
dictionary.summon:
I would do anything for him.
I mean, I love him!

extra skill.desc: ＢＣ・ＨＣ出現率をかなりアップ
extra skill.name: 汚れ無き純焔

leader skill.desc: スパーク時、ＢＣ出現率を大幅にアップ・ＢＢゲージを少し増加
leader skill.name: 闘神の栄冠

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性４０連ダメージ＆確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下＆味方全体に３ターン、確率で攻撃力を１ターン低下する効果を付与
sbb.name: ルビィ・ヴァニッシュ

ubb.desc: 敵全体に超強力な炎属性３４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数をかなり増加・回復力に応じて攻撃力を超絶アップ
ubb.name: ヒュペリオン

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: ゼラススウィープ

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を２５％アップ＆全属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 五光赤神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をアップ
bb.name: グリムラサレーション

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を５０％アップ＆全属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 五光赫神の力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をかなりアップ
bb.name: スピリテッドフレンジー

leader skill.desc: パーティのユニットが５属性以上で攻撃力を６５％アップ＆全属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ
leader skill.name: 五光緋神の力

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１６連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をかなりアップ＆２ターン、防御貫通効果を付与
sbb.name: レゾルートフェロシティー

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージを増加＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: ベルムイグニス

dictionary.description: The aerial force commander of an empire from another world. Not only was she the leader of a massive force capable of overwhelming entire countries, but was also regarded as a hero for single-handedly taking down countless enemy vessels with her high-pressure fire rifle. However, during the great war that cost her country everything, her warship was destroyed due to the treacherous acts of one of her subordinates. She then closed her eyes as she fell from the sky, only to find herself in the strange land of Ishgria when she awoke.
dictionary.fusion:
The key behind a good corps begins
with the training of its members.
You have good judgment.
dictionary.summon:
Show me your battle plans.
Everything starts from there.
I don't expect much from you though.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 絶神の聖域

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１６連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加
bb.name: ベルムディスターブ

dictionary.description: The aerial force commander of an empire from another world. As she wandered about Ishgria, she came to the conclusion that she was in the land of the dead. Looking back on her war exploits she figured it couldn't be helped that she had ended up in some type of hell, though the demons she met there revealed to her that she was still alive. And just when she decided to start a new life in Ishgria after her powers were acknowledged by a portion of the demon populace, a war amongst the demons themselves broke loose. She then decided to head towards this new battlefield.
dictionary.evolution:
You have good judgment.
It will come in handy later.
Unless you get too cocky.
dictionary.fusion:
Well done.
Now let's continue with our strategy.
The end result will prove its worth.
dictionary.summon:
You don't have to be harsh on your
troops, but you can't go easy
on them either. That's all.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を軽減＆ＢＢ発動時のＢＢゲージの消費量を少し軽減
leader skill.name: 焔軍神の魔境

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１９連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ・被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージをかなり増加
sbb.name: 私が道を切り拓く！

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性２０連ダメージ＆味方のＢＢゲージをかなり増加＆味方全体に３ターン、ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: ベルムランページ

dictionary.description: The aerial force commander of an empire from another world. Though she found herself involved in a war on an unknown territory, her resolve to fight was absolute. Her ingenuity and boldness lead her faction to countless victories over other camps, which is said to have threatened even the demons who ruled such lands. Her name echoed throughout the whole of Ishgria, though most demons failed to recognize she was human, and unknowingly considered her one of their own. However, not a single soul in the land ever came to know her reason for fighting.
dictionary.evolution:
Demons and humans are no different.
We are all terrible creatures
unable to work together.
dictionary.fusion:
Continue training. One day your
efforts will turn into confidence,
and ultimately into your charm.
dictionary.summon:
This is who I am.
I'm ready for betrayal, but even so,
I want to trust you.

extra skill.desc: 通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加
extra skill.name: 高貴なる孤高

bb.name: ファーヴェント・エッジ

dictionary.description: A Summoner who served the Akras Summoners' Hall since the dawn of time. Though initially a soldier of humble beginnings from the Randall Empire, he quickly rose through the ranks to become a general, earning the support of many young soldiers along the way. However, he was unsatisfied with the small skirmishes between the Empire and the Federation, instead hoping for the chance to fight in a real battle. That opportunity presented itself when the First Summoner returned from Grand Gaia and Griff challenged him to a fierce duel. A few days later he sent his letter of resignation to the Imperial Army, and joined Summoners' Hall.
dictionary.fusion:
You think this training's enough?!
The enemy's not gonna take it
easy on you, you know!
dictionary.summon:
Congratulations for summoning me.
But I dare you to show me a
petty fight. I'll send you flying.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の霊力

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃に炎・水属性を付与＆クリティカルダメージをアップ
bb.name: ファーヴェント・シェル

dictionary.description: The former commander of the now defunct 4th Squadron of the Demon Slayers. Griff held a strong leadership position during the early days of Summoners' Hall which was only second to that of the Summoners of Old. He hammered the basics of battle into the new Summoners that had just joined with him, and grew to become a very capable Summoner himself. The red armor he wears, which he found while surveying the Agni Region, is believed to have been made through the forbidden research conducted by the ruined Agni Empire. Also, only a handful of people know the reason why the single digit number used by his Demon Slayers' squadron is no longer in use.
dictionary.evolution:
Yeah! That's the spirit! You just
learned something really valuable.
Don't ever forget it!
dictionary.fusion:
If you have so much time to waste,
then train some more!
It'll take your mind off things!
dictionary.summon:
Do you grasp the horror of
exhausting all your resources?
If not, we best get you up to speed.

dictionary.description: A Summoner assigned to serve as the commander of the covert "Ishgria's Recon Squad." As soon as he and his squadron landed in Ishgria, they were immediately exposed to the attacks of a powerful demon. When Griff noticed that this demon only wanted to face a strong opponent, he left the squadron in Krantz's hands and remained behind to fight the demon alone. According to records found in Ishgria, the battle between Griff and the demon lasted for several days and made for such a fierce offensive and defensive competition, that the memory lived in the minds of many demons thereafter.
dictionary.evolution:
Can you see it? This is power!
Your training won't disappoint you!
It'll foster self-confidence!
dictionary.fusion:
So you've got some guts after all.
Must be the results of your training.
What's with the smile?
dictionary.summon:
The job of the old is to protect the
future of the young. That's why
I'll keep getting stronger.

bb.name: 黒晶片の燐光

dictionary.description: Wielder of the Sacred Crystal. Long ago when humans had no means to defend themselves against demons, Rineth prayed to the gods for strength. She then gained an enormous amount of power, using it to defeat countless enemies. However, though she had sought this power to protect her beloved family and friends, the people never praised her as a hero. Instead, they came to fear the god-like powers she wielded, and thus her name went down in history as a demonic figure.
dictionary.fusion:
Look at my precious crystals...
They get brighter and brighter...
How lovely...
dictionary.summon:
I'm no heroine...
But I want to help everyone...
So I'll help you out...

leader skill.desc: ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
leader skill.name: 神撃の脈動

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、炎・樹属性の弱点属性ダメージをアップ・ターン毎にＢＢゲージをかなり増加
bb.name: 黒宝晶の熾光

dictionary.description: Wielder of the Sacred Crystal. The demonic powers of the crystal Rineth had found in a cave during her youth grew along with her. Thinking that she possessed far too much power for a human, one day a certain god tried to take the crystal away from her. And though till that moment no incidents of humans striking the gods had been heard of, she defeated one incoming god after the other. From that point the rebellious Rineth came to be branded as a demon-like human in the annals of history.
dictionary.evolution:
I don't care if you fear me...
I have my crystals, so I'm fine...
But...you know...
dictionary.fusion:
The radiance of my crystals
is almost scary now...
Not that I'm actually scared...
dictionary.summon:
My crystals are a treasure?
I don't know anything about that...
They don't even have a name...

bb.name: 黒輝宝晶の煉光

dictionary.description: Wielder of the Sacred Crystal. Though she was endlessly pursued by the very gods who feared her, Rineth continued fighting for the human cause. As her crystals grew stronger with every fight, the gods finally decided to stop chasing her in vain. However, it was then when a demon, a being which frightened even the gods, began attacking human villages. There is no doubt that Rineth confronted this demon, but curiously all the information left about the encounter only tells of two demons fighting each other.
dictionary.evolution:
You're not scared
to see my evolved form?
Wow... Thanks...
dictionary.fusion:
I've been made a slave
by the crystals' beauty...
Won't you join me?
I'm sure it'd be lovely...
dictionary.summon:
I hate the gods...
They try to take power
from those who don't even have any...

dictionary.description: A division commander of the Sorcerer’s Army from another world guided by the Chain Chronicle. The patterns tattooed all over his body are actual magical seals which hide great powers within him. Even amongst the most talented of his peers, Velnar boasts of unparalleled abilities and is considered a top class "sealer." However, his genuine appetite for destruction turns him into a demon on the battlefield, brutally wounding and then violently killing his enemies without the slightest hint of mercy. For this reason, some fear that one day Velnar may target one of his own comrades.
dictionary.fusion:
Hey! Let's hurry to the battlefield!
Don't waste time on useless stuff
like synthesizing ingredients!
dictionary.summon:
Huh...? Who the heck are you?
Well, ya summoned me,
but can ya handle me?!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ＆ＨＰが半分以上の時、攻撃力をアップ
leader skill.name: 破壊魔の心

bb.name: 爆ぜろぉぉ！

dictionary.description: A division commander of the Sorcerer’s Army from another world guided by the Chain Chronicle. Velnar conjures destructive firestorms to instantly pulverize any enemies who stand in his way, turning them into ashes. Though generally drunk by the ecstasy he feels when he goes battle-crazed on the field, he seems to believe that a lot of unnecessary fights happen when people refuse to compromise with each other. Some speculate that because Velnar is much too sensitive to the hearts of those around him, he relieves all the stress he gathers from interacting with his superiors and comrades by continuously destroying everything around him.
dictionary.evolution:
BOOM!!
Hahaha! Did I scare ya?!
That was the sound of my rebirth!
dictionary.fusion:
Burnnn!
I'm getting excited just thinking
about who to incinerate first!
dictionary.summon:
Demon or not,
I'll smash everything to bits!
Fwa hah!!

bb.name: ヴァトラフォール

dictionary.description: The demon who founded the new nation of Mildran to the west of Lem in ancient Ishgria. Adel's open-mindedness allowed him to put various revolutionary ideas into motion for his country. Not only was he extremely independent and innovative, but he also boasted of great physical prowess. After founding his nation, Adel's next goal was to take down the leader of the demon world and do away with the old regime in order to unify Ishgria. No other demon has been known to have had such grand ambitions.
dictionary.fusion:
Is this how you accomplish
your objectives?
I shall accept it.
dictionary.summon:
You summoned me here?
Then show me!
Show me the path you've laid ahead!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 絶神の聖域

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１１連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: ヴァトラスピキュール

dictionary.description: The king of Mildran. After conquering half of Ishgria with his military forces, Adel sought to take control over the remaining half by challenging the queen of a country called Estria. Both rulers fought against each other in hand-to-hand combat, but no one knows anything more of the exchange between them. However, after their battle Adel decided that force was not the way to rule Ishgria, but cooperation between neighboring nations instead.
dictionary.evolution:
Can you see it?
The new form attached to my ideals.
This is but a part of it.
dictionary.fusion:
A truly powerful being not only
boasts of great strength, but also of
the power to change others' minds.
dictionary.summon:
Come with me!
I shall show you a new world
where my ideals have become reality!

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの防御力・最大ＨＰを３０％アップ＆確率で被ダメージを２０％軽減
leader skill.name: 覇王の聖界

sbb.desc: 敵全体に強力な炎属性１４連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ・ターン毎にＨＰを大回復＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
sbb.name: ロード・エンデュランス

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１３連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、スパークダメージをかなりアップ＆１ターン、被ダメージを半分に軽減
bb.name: ヴァトラディフィート

dictionary.description: Any hope for the revolutionary regime Adel sought after came to a halt due to the endless fighting within Ishgria. The queen of Estria was said to have stolen Adel's heart and influenced him with her pacifist ideals, which contradicted their own demonic nature. In return, this led them both to be branded as enemies of the demon world. It was then when Adel's confidant Jed decided to rebel against him, and pursued him along with the queen. Today Adel and the Queen of Estria's whereabouts remain unknown after their persecution.
dictionary.evolution:
This is not the end!
You shall realize the dreams
that I left behind!
dictionary.fusion:
Look, this is reality!
No matter how strong you get,
you will always have limits!
dictionary.summon:
After losing my ideals I gained
someone precious to me
and a small being who holds our fate.

extra skill.desc: 被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを増加
extra skill.name: 現実的な夢想家

leader skill.name: 征覇帝の皇界

sbb.name: デューク・エンデュランス

ubb.name: 覇煌『カーディナルジーン』

bb.name: アーデント・アーツ

dictionary.description: A mock Unit based on Elise, the young receptionist in charge of handling the Raid requests from the Akras Summoners' Hall. Though she no longer fights on the field, Elise was once the vice-commander of the "Silver Knights," the 21st Division of the Demon Slayers. Noah, the commander of the Silver Knights, thought very highly of Elise's abilities, and considered her his most trusted ally and advisor. Unlike him, however, Elise paid a lot more attention to minor details, which earned her the trust of her comrades as well.
dictionary.fusion:
In return for this power,
I'll do my very best.
Although I don't really know
how much use I'll be...
dictionary.summon:
Are you here to accept a mission?
What?! I've been summoned?!
Do you really think I can help?

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力を１５％アップ＆攻撃ＢＢの威力をアップ
leader skill.name: 銀騎士隊の印

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１０連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃ＢＢの威力を少しアップ・ＢＣ獲得時の増加量をアップ
bb.name: ヴェルミオン・アーツ

dictionary.description: A mock Unit based on Elise. Elise's abilities as a Summoner grew immensely during her time as vice-commander, until injuries from an altercation with a certain demon forced her to retire. Noah, the commander of the Silver Knights, then began having problems with his men after Elise's absence, which only served to remind him of the importance of her role in the division. Unfortunately, this mock Unit is based on Elise's currently diminished abilities, as Noel believes that one's real power can only be claimed by oneself.
dictionary.evolution:
Oh, it looks like I've changed!
And maybe got a bit stronger, too.
I think I may be able to help now!
dictionary.fusion:
I don't know what this is,
but it feels nice!
It's like I'm becoming stronger...
I feel like I can work harder now!
dictionary.summon:
Who do you take me for?
I won't let neither you nor Noel
get away with anything weird!

dictionary.description: A knight who served the Agni Empire before the great war with the gods. Formal records depicting his service state that he vanished after having been granted an audience with the emperor at the time. Many speculated that he disappeared in order to carry out the emperor's secret orders, which was proven to be true thanks to documents that surfaced afterwards. However, he would later suffer an accident that would leave him in a state of amnesia while on his mission. According to a certain blacksmith's diary, Avant was found wandering about during the latter half of the great war.
dictionary.fusion:
I know I'll regain my powers...
Then it's off to the field again.
Wait, did I say "again"?
dictionary.summon:
Are you inviting me to a new battle?
Very well then.
I just have to wield my sword again.

leader skill.desc: 全てのユニットの最大ＨＰを３０％アップ
leader skill.name: 覇王の天啓

bb.desc: 敵全体に炎属性１２連ダメージ＆味方全体に３ターン、攻撃力をかなりアップ・クリティカル率を大幅にアップ
bb.name: フレアブレイズ

dictionary.description: A former knight of the Agni Empire. After having lost his memories, a scarred blacksmith appeared before him wielding a sword ablaze. As the blacksmith handed the blade to Avant, he confided in him that the sword knew everything there was to know. They stood in silence for a short while, but the God Army would eventually come in pursuit of the blacksmith. Picking up the sword to stand against the God Army, Avant was engulfed by the will of Fire and recovered his memories.
dictionary.evolution:
My memories are coming back
along with my powers...
I...I have to keep fighting!
dictionary.fusion:
I was too weak to do anything...
So this time I need to be stronger
so that I regret nothing in the end!
dictionary.summon:
I don't know who I am.
But the moment I held this sword,
a small boy came to mind.

bb.name: フレアヴィジョン

dictionary.description: A former knight of the Agni Empire. Having recovered his memories, Avant remembered that he had lost all hope in the world after the death of his son. Feeling helpless for having been unable to do anything about it, he cried for three days and three nights before traveling with his blade again. This time his goal would be the new promised land, though once he caught up with the refugees on their way there, he did not actually join them. Instead, he kept an eye on them from afar, single-handedly protecting them from the God Army on their tail.
dictionary.evolution:
Making them regret this isn't enough.
I will pulverize their souls!
And my fire will incinerate the gods!
dictionary.fusion:
Fire, empower Dandelga!
Use your burning power to incinerate
the gods who hurt my people!
dictionary.summon:
My flame was his ceremonial bonfire.
It's the only thing I could do
after having accomplished nothing.

bb.name: 煉獣傑爪

dictionary.description: The empress of the rising Agni Empire. Vermilion is known as the heroine who continuously invaded other countries in order to expand the reach of her empire. Not only are her achievements recorded in Agni's history, but stories of her exploits have spread all over the land over centuries, making her a very popular character to this day. Though she was the monarch of her nation, Vermilion was a powerful warrior mage who always fought in the frontlines alongside a beast she had conjured from hot lava, which always accompanied her. The very sight of her is said to have struck fear in the hearts of her enemies, but inspired unwavering trust from her allies.
dictionary.fusion:
You seem unhappy.
Pledge yourself to me.
I promise not to do you any harm.
dictionary.summon:
You shall obey me.
And if you do, I shall love you.
He he... What a fool.

10774.name: 鳳獣神ヴァーミリオン

bb.name: 煉魔獣 鋼傑爪

dictionary.description: The empress of the rising Agni Empire. The following year after ancient Vriksha suffered from a terrible plague, Vermilion built an army to search for fertile land in which to grow crops for her empire. However, her troops encountered a demon during one of their marches and were crushed by its immense power, along with the hopes of the empress. It is said that Vermilion ordered her forces to retreat while she remained behind, fighting the demon until every single one of her men had escaped.
dictionary.evolution:
This is like preparation for battle.
I can feel my blood boiling.
I'm quite excited, you know.
dictionary.fusion:
So you've gotten used to serving me.
Well, I dare say that you are now
my third most trusted servant.
dictionary.summon:
Your enemies are demons?
Then I shall help you...
I will turn them to ashes!

bb.name: 煉魔獣 皇烈衝

dictionary.description: Research conducted in Grand Gaia during recent years has uncovered more information regarding this legendary empress. According to a story written on ancient parchment, Vermilion found herself mostly on the defensive during her battle against the demon which had attacked her troops. Nonetheless, being a talented and instinctive warrior, the empress was able to outmaneuver the demon and awaken her true power during the struggle. It is written that after this took place, Vermilion was finally able to face her opponent on the same level, making for a fair fight. However, this account differs greatly from her supposed glorious victory previously recorded in Agni's history.
dictionary.evolution:
Ahh... Another adrenaline rush...
But I can still fight...
This battle shall never end...
dictionary.fusion:
You are adorable.
Come closer.
There is no need for restraint.
dictionary.summon:
No defeats shall tarnish my name.
My actions are justice.
My words are fact.
